name: Accelerated Mutation
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor_text: Its food just got a lot smaller and its stomach a lot bigger.

name: Astral Steel
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Aven Farseer
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Farseer.
flavor_text: His enemies' trickery and deceit only fuel his righteous anger.

name: Aven Liberator
oracle_text:
Flying
Morph {3}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Aven Liberator is turned face up, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Bonethorn Valesk
oracle_text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, Bonethorn Valesk deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Barbarians weave its spurs into ceremonial charms to proclaim their hardiness in battle.

name: Break Asunder
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "No good will come of this."

name: Carrion Feeder
oracle_text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
flavor_text: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

name: Chartooth Cougar
oracle_text:
{R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Clutch of Undeath
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.
flavor_text: The hand of death recognizes its own.

name: Coast Watcher
oracle_text: Flying, protection from green
flavor_text: The aven came to fear the forest's clawing branches, but the watchers quickly renewed their courage.

name: Daru Spiritualist
oracle_text: Whenever a Cleric creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: He lifts the spirits of his people so they may descend in wrath upon their foes.

name: Death's-Head Buzzard
oracle_text:
Flying
When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

name: Dispersal Shield
oracle_text: Counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
flavor_text: "Maybe next time."

name: Divergent Growth
oracle_text: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: Nature has forgotten its own rules.

name: Dragon Breath
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When a creature with mana value 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

name: Dragon Fangs
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
When a creature with mana value 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Fangs from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

name: Dragon Scales
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance.
When a creature with mana value 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Scales from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

name: Dragon Shadow
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

name: Dragon Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

When a creature with mana value 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Wings from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

name: Fierce Empath
oracle_text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Frontline Strategist

Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.

name: Frozen Solid
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

name: Goblin Brigand
oracle_text: Goblin Brigand attacks each combat if able.

name: Goblin War Strike
oracle_text: Goblin War Strike deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Goblins you control.
flavor_text: "Fire, aim, ready!"

name: Guilty Conscience
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.
flavor_text:
Those who most feel guilt don't need to, while those who most need to feel guilt never do.
—Order proverb

name: Hindering Touch

name: Krosan Drover
oracle_text: Creature spells you cast with mana value 6 or greater cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: "Sit."

name: Lingering Death

Enchant creature
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature.

name: Mercurial Kite

Flying
Whenever Mercurial Kite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
